description:
TUDA describes itself as a blockchain-based education service that aims to enhance the educational experience as well as increase teachers' earning power. TUDA aims to create the largest education community and allow content producers to monetize their content and receive copyright protection. Policies and educational content are verified with the goal of enhancing the educational experience for users.

name: Tutor's Diary
